entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable sample based tracing to track issues in high performance/load scenarios #77520
  • .NET 8 experiments: container performance and density #77517
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce source generation based support for .NET metrics API #77516
    8.0.0
  • StreamReader array allocations should be pool-able #77515
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce DI friendly IMeter<T> for modern services #77514
    8.0.0
  • Mono's behavior around .beforefieldinit #77513
  • [mono][hot reload] MethodBase.GetParameters on added method causes a crash #77512
    7.0.x
  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools failed because of missing package #77494
  • For HttpClient with HttpMessageHandler is getting called multiple times for single SendAsync #77495
  • [NativeAOT] Broken COMDAT support in ObjWriter #77491
  • [MONO][PERF] Master Issue For Microbenchmark Perf #77490
  • [tests] TestIcuAppLocal failing to load app-local ICU on Windows x64 #77485
    8.0.0
  • CreateDirectory uses custom security descriptor for parents #77482
  • Tracing a very simple .NET 6 Android app with AOT shows calls to RuntimeHelpers.CompileMethod #77479
  • Test failure GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #77477
  • [NativeAOT] Failed to load SQLitePCLRaw.core #77476
  • [tests][Android] LargeHeaders_TrickledOverTime_ProcessedEfficiently Insufficient Memory #77474
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] ManagedError constructor has significant overhead due to reading Error.stack #77473
    8.0.0
  • Debuggin Blazor Webassembly project of Visual Studio 2022 does not work correctly with a Visual Basic Library .NET 6 or .NET Standard Project containing Async method. #77481
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Low level API support for Objective-C scenarios #77472
  • [tests] System.IO.Pipes.Tests NamedPipeTest Permission Denied on Linux Bionic #77470
    Future
  • [tests] System.IO.Pipes.Tests NamedPipeTest Failing on iOS/tvOS #77469
    Future
  • Test failure GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh #77466

Closed

  • superpmi-diffs and superpmi-replay are running when jiteeversionguid.h changes #69197
    8.0.0
  • Buffered file stream doesn't flush data right #77373
    8.0.0
  • [jit-cfg] Runtime_73681 FileCheck fails #77430
    8.0.0
  • [ARM64/Linux] Inefficiencies when using initializing/cleaning unsafe pointers #12736
    Future
  • Hosting API: Xamarin-macios uses the CoreCLR hosting functions `coreclr_initialize`, `coreclr_create_delegate`, and `coreclr_execute_assembly` to execute some managed code before the application-defined main method starts running. NativeAOT would need some sort of "hosting API" to support this. #77493
  • Use custom GC PAL for all GC build flavors #72684
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose maybe first-entry of internal Enum values #77463
  • Consider failing early when (de)serializing enum values that contain commas #73712
    Future
  • [tests][tvOS] Some System.IO tests are failing #67853
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: {Last}IndexOf{AnyExcept}Range #76106
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failure "GlobalizationMode.UseNls" in CalendarData.GetTwoDigitYearMax #77451
    8.0.0
  • Unable to hijack thread in empty while (true) loop #5724
    Future
  • Can't pause .net core application on Mac OS while debugging #44939
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests for NativeAOT #77522
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize ManagedError ctor and (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [PERF] Fix SOD and Startup builds for performance. #77519
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • SPMI: Extend list of unrecorded environment variables #77504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Source-Build: Remove ILStrip dependency from mono #77503
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Update `lvaEnregMultiRegVars` and `lvaEnregEHVars` when switching to MinOpts #77502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing when trying to call mono functions in a non wasm page #77501
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Removing repeated line #77500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix globalization test on Mono #77499
    area-System.Globalization
  • Change default value of TC_OnStackReplacement_InitialCounter to 200 #77498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary call to type.GetFields(), add test case for literalfield #77497
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing when trying to call mono functions in a non wasm page #77496
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Workloads] Add UsingMobileWorkload property to control loading net7 packs #77489
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure JsonConverter<T>.Read/WriteAsPropertyName methods are user-callable. #77488
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Disable tests failing on runtime extra platforms #77487
  • Scale back PGO testing #77484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Invalidate FileInfo after CreateText and AppendText #77483
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix issue with spurious unproductive full GC which led to OOM. #77478
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix Arm64 Emulated TLS #77475
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add README docs for XML libraries #77401
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Update jitformat pipeline to .NET 6 #77511
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid running SPMI pipelines on JIT-EE GUID change #77431
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [FileStream] Flush(flushToDisk: true) should always flush to disk #77384
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add README docs for collection libraries #77422
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Add test that console stream async reads complete asynchronously #77492
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Decrease backlog cleanup inactivity threshold #77288
    area-Meta
  • Disable DisasmChecks if DOTNET_JitForceControlFlowGuard is set #77467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • statically link gc_pal on windows #77468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up converter initialization logic. #77290
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Handle GT_IND in optVNConstantPropCurStmt #77105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add README.md to System.Text.Json #77435
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add {Last}IndexOfAny{Except}InRange #76803
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Skip NamedPipeTest_CurrentUserOnly on iOSlike and LinuxBionic #77471
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] Vector128 ConvertTo API's for Amd64 #77211
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove the invalid assert #77462
    area-System.Globalization
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

Updated

  • Slightly improve string unrolling for length 5 and 6 #77398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Extending variable live ranges in more cases #77439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77443
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.x
  • Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #77425
    area-Host
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #77448
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
  • Simplify AppHost/ElfUtils #77208
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add compiler-generated code tests for NativeAot #77457
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • [wasm] browser profiler #77449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Use u8 in Utf8Formatter date formatting #77395
    area-System.Buffers
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Avoiding printing twice variable live range #77447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Lazily instantiate JsonSerializerOptions.Converters #77219
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to build multiple variants SxS #77427
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove bash dependency from init-compiler #77304
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add the ability to start and stop IHostedService instances concurrently #75894
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add LLVM documentation. #77445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Green Thread Experiment #2057

PullRequests

Created

  • New helper for green thread stack segments #2056

Updated

  • Transition to os thread on pinvoke #2053

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLI Solution Sync Command #28781
  • CLI Solution Clean Command #28780
  • Running `dotnet new blazor` doesn't suggest any of the Blazor templates #28779
  • (7.0 rc2) dotnet build suddenly stopped working #28777

Closed

  • `RuntimeIdentifier` in project is not respected when building/publishing as self-contained #25062
    7.0.1xx
  • Consider using `PublishAot` for Android and Blazor WASM #25392
    7.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Error happens "Workload installation failed: Access to the path 'C:\ProgramData\dotnet\workloads\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task.Msi.x64\7.0.0-rtm.22507.1\msi.json' is denied." when installing workload using another account. #28450
  • Inconsistent perms on some directories SDK writes into /tmp #26022
    7.0.1xx
  • Use implicit RID for `Publish` Properties #26028
    7.0.1xx
  • Incorrect translation for WorkloadUpdatesAvailable for some languages #27424
    7.0.1xx
  • Restore solution fails when multiple projects in same directory #28763
  • dotnet build/run failing (almost) siliently Ubuntu Linux #28471
  • Unable to generate ready to run compilation for managed code that references native assemblies #28223

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch back to the shipped RC2 build #28785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • removed `v` prefix from `dotnetcli` host version #28776

Merged

  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads
  • [Cherrypick main->7.0.2xx] Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new host #28736
    Area-dotnet new
  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT] Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28749
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-dotnet new
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
  • add console message for package validation success or failure #28769
    Area-ApiCompat, DO NOT MERGE
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add unit tests for reserved aliases and host specific template data #28748

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal] Object initializers for factory methods #803

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: `Task<T>` nullability covariance #3950
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354

PullRequests

Merged

  • Revert "Flow `scoped` in anonymous function conversion" #6595
  • Fix generic parameter rendering #6599

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extension method for object suggested on experssion evaluated to void #65020
    17.5
  • XML comments cannot correctly reference properties named 'Item' #65017
  • IDE0004 false positive when we need to box a nullable value type, and we have a cast in place. #65005
  • [Compiler / Analyzer Bug] -- Objects leak across projects in a single solution #65001
  • `NotNullIfNotNullAttribute` does not work when a methodgroup is passed to `IEnumerable<>.Select` #65000
  • Error returning default value for a nullable type from a generic method. #64994
    17.5
  • Copying out of raw string literal results in indented contents #64993

Closed

  • IDE0019 'use pattern matching' duplicates preprocessor #37398
    Backlog
  • CodeFix of `Implement interface` always implemented explicitly for ReferenceType+interface constraints with interface and Enum/Delegate/MulticastDelegate constraints #34580
    Backlog
  • Refactoring "Use expression body for methods" suggests it applies to multiple methods #36017
    Backlog
  • Warning AD0001 Analyzer 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UseIndexOrRangeOperator.CSharpUseRangeOperatorDiagnosticAnalyzer' threw an exception #39844
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2019 suggests code changes that aren't compatible with explict LangVersion #37481
    Backlog
  • Introduce local refactroing generates strange code #37075
    Backlog
  • IDE0059 wrong span for unused assignment #36202
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33026.251 #65030
  • Deleting empty lines causes the cursor to indent #35883
    Backlog
  • Code fix "use pattern match" messes with #region lines #35789
    Backlog
  • [C# 8.0]" Simplify dispose statement" removes whitespace from indented arguments #35491
    Backlog
  • Building crash using newer .NET SDK than 6.0.203 #64774
    17.5
  • AbstractResolveConflictMarkerCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34461
    Backlog
  • 'if' statement with lambda CANNOT be simplified in C# #33284
    Backlog
  • Enum in expression tree #65006
  • Allow "Convert cast" refactorings to work with nullable value types #64466
  • 'SyntaxEditorBasedFixAllProvider' encountered an error - InvalidCastException #33895
    Backlog
  • VS2019.4: "Convert to interpolated string" refactoring is not always offered and does not work correctly in some circumstances #33865
    Backlog
  • Infer Tuple item names from method names #33768
    Backlog
  • VS 15.9.7 IDE0025 Codefix Bug #33561
    Backlog
  • Function pointers shouldn't trigger IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #50976
    Backlog
  • Trivia gets shuffled around when batch fixing InlineDeclaration codefix #31459
    Backlog
  • UseAutoProperty in VB not offered when property is readonly and the field is written to #30351
    Backlog
  • "Add accessibility modifiers" lightbulb fix dialogue misleading #29633
    Backlog
  • CS0103 code fix could probably do better in overloaded situations. #28996
    Backlog
  • Compiler trouble due to nint/nuint and IntPtr/UIntPtr? #64628
  • .NET 7 RC 2 breaks F# to C# interop #64992
  • `Change to direct cast` creates nullability warning #64052
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 - Debug tooltip does not show value #41974
    Backlog
  • The implicit operator allows converting null literal to non-nullable type without CS8600 #64638
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix completion lists not appearing in a using-statement #65033
    Area-IDE
  • Remove "System.Threading.Channels" from vsix #65028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #65024
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Preserve destination trivia when inlining temps #65021
    Area-IDE
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add brace-matching support for block comments #65014
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases to match when simplifying delegate invokes #65010
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid infinite loop in Find All References #65009
    Area-IDE
  • Reuse `LambdaSymbol` when inferring delegate type #65003
    Area-Compilers
  • Extend pattern explainer for more complicated graphs #65002
    Area-Compilers
  • Sort the options we give back in 'alias ambiguous type' #64997
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix trivia handling in 'use pattern matching' #65032
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support implementing interface methods with constraints that are supported in later versions of C# #65026
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract name recommendation logic into a separate type #64981
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use the singular form in some analyzer titles #65031
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify the walk we do when determining indentation regions #65027
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65025
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic snippets - while snippet #64893
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #65023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Account for delegate creation inside an explicitly-converted tuple expression #64882
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, Next
  • Add test demonstrating fixed issue #65019
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Doc IAttributeOperation change #64980
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Implement convert cast refactorings for nullable value types #65007
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Change wording so to pass Accessibility Insights #64418
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable MSBuild server in our tests #65013
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65012
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not report IDE1005 on function pointer invocations #65011
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64874
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support additional case for VB where we can convert to an auto-prop #64996
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Produce proper title when removing accessibility modifiers #64995
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve generate-method result with multiple potential overloads #64974
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix test flakeyness #64989
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Suppress IOperation validation for lambda parameter initializers #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64999
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64998
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64991
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Upload xunit results as an attachment from helix #64957
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65034
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Foreach ref assignment without identity conversion should give error #64879
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Revert "Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters (#64680)" #64986
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add lambda `params` mismatch error #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • add validation for powershell scripts in CI #64987
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Compiler outputs #63882
    Area-Compilers
  • Check escape after converting #64976
    Area-Compilers
  • REmove complex diagnostic options and options changing reentrancy #64979
    Area-IDE
  • Complete move to net70 ref assemblies #64833
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure .NET Core MSBuild Workspace tests actually run in PR validation #64830
    Area-IDE
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Consistently extract synthesized delegate info from method symbol #64966
    Area-Compilers
  • Make instructions for STE a live region for screen readers #64988
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running ASP.NET Core apps using HTTPS on macOS results in Keychain Access prompts #44754
    7.0.1
  • Run Debugger on WebApi project which is stored within WSL2 #44751
  • Blazor / SEO / index in search engines #44750
  • .NET 7.0 RC2 breaks MVC build where a view references an F# model #44749
  • [Minimal API] Http methods overload #44746
  • API proposal: enable configuring connection timeouts in HubConnectionBuilder #44742
  • .NET Core 7 Output Cache does not work with app.UseEndpoints() properly #44739

Closed

  • aspnet:5.0-alpine docker image has reference to zlib-1.2.12-r0 which has vulnerability CVE-2022-37434 #44736
  • Swashbuckle and also NSwag error with "no operations defined in spec" in a complex application #44733
  • blazor wasm project deployed with error #43738
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor template first link fills whole horizontal space inside top-row #44133
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Asp.net core .cs file encoding is not uft-8 encoded #37201
    Backlog
  • Angular Templates - npm run test errors #32433
    8.0-MQ
  • Windows Authentication not working in Kestrel running in Linux (Ubuntu) #44681

PullRequests

Created

  • Match strangely formatted PathBase #42751 #44753
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages (backport #43937) #44752
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add "blazor" as shortname for Blazor Server template #44748
    area-blazor, feature-templates, blazor-server
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10949

  • [iOS] Title is bugged during and after page transition #10945
  • [BUG][Android] Absolute Layout's layout flags and bounds not working in initial loading condition. #10944
    Backlog
  • Multiple Collection Views don't display correctly with visual studio for Mac compiled for Mac Catalyst. #10943
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst app launches multiple windows if previous launch had multiple windows open #10939
    Backlog
  • Publish Maui app as exe not work on window 10 #10938
  • Clarification required: On screen keyboard #5272 #10922
  • Unable to convert Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.LayoutHandler to UIKit.UIView #10918
  • Label WordWrap does not work inside HorziontalStackLayout or StackLayout with horizontal orientation #10917
    Backlog
  • Image is not rendering correctly with `Aspect` property other than `Center` #10916
    Backlog
  • Setter TargetName="check" Property="Opacity" breaks hot reload #10915
  • [Localization] Binding bug on release mode #10914

Closed

  • Failed To Build/Publish "Maui Blazor App" In Android Release Mode #10602
  • Grid + CollectionView cause crash #10711

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Select projection can create a single instance of a member class in multiple main objects #29436
  • AsSplitQuery checks ids, what causes missing data. #29430
  • Does CVE-2022-35737 affect Microsoft.Data.Sqlite? #29429
  • Stop using LegacyReferenceEqualityComparer #29428
  • Map collections of primitive types to JSON column in relational database #29427
    Backlog
  • Mapping attribute for to specify a value converter type #29426
    Backlog

Closed

  • Support arrays of primitive types in in-memory database #11926
  • Option to generate model snapshot that uses IEntityTypeConfiguration #20104
  • [Bug] EF Core 3.1.30 : A query with several identical raw SQL texts do bad projection #29432
  • multiple interceptor and ordering of execution #29392
  • RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetSchemaQualifiedTableName() should ignore schemas when used with SQLite #29378
  • It has an endless loop, and its ideal result is the same as "Teacher=null", because I have no Include. #29364
  • System.Drawing.Common is transitively referenced by Micosoft.Data.SqlClient 5.0.1 meaning that AWS Lambda now fails #29316
  • Define temporal tables by data annotation #29431
  • Allow query tags to be forced inside generated SQL to prevent SQL Server from stripping them from "query text entries" #20105
  • "The LINQ expression could not be translated" with in-memory provider #24318
  • Scaffolding: Consider changing how we aggregate usings #28640
  • Visual Studio Package Manager Console EFCore Tools not working #28407
  • Feature request: Providing us with MigrationsAssembly<T>() #27711
  • Allow templates to be placed anywhere instead of CodeTemplates from the scaffolder. #27656
  • TableBuilder config ignored on derived entity types in a TPH hierarchy #27620
  • SqliteCommand allocates one Stopwatch per every query or prepare #26295
  • Scaffolded DbContext contains unnecessary relationship configuration #25404
  • Clean up code cleanup #25355
  • Scaffolding of synonyms in SqlServer #23395
  • SQLite: Use multi-threaded mode by default #22330
  • Implement SqliteException.SqlState #21599
  • Implement SqliteException.IsTransient #21598
  • Defining which wins if they are different, navigational links or foreign key values? #21105
    7.0.0
  • Allow migrations configuration to be automatically be picked up from a cloned repo #20862
  • Add built-in support for injecting ILogger into entities #20203
  • Stream, TextReader & XmlReader properties #19991
  • Generate copy-paste queries for logging #19756
  • Use <inheritdoc/> #18003
  • Running migration on published dll #16882
  • Consider an overload of `Update` that specifies which properties should be modified #15493
  • Support loading recursive relationships to any depth #14144
  • Revisit whether InternalsVisibleTo to tests is needed #13171
  • Improve reverse engineering extensibility #12050
  • Allow provider-specific arguments to be passed to the scaffolding process #11982
  • Build a Roslyn-based parser for the Code First model #11659
  • SQLite: Translate Guid.NewGuid() #11520
  • Performance: Review impact of new features on what happens during a request #11511
  • EF Core 2.0.1 AfterSaveBehavior for read-only identity column is set to PropertySaveBehavior.Save instead of PropertySaveBehavior.Throw #10706
  • Uniquify relational names on demand #10337
  • Add testing for Xamarin #8792
  • Allow IConfiguration to be set on DbContextOptionsBuilder #8659
  • Migrations: Data motion APIs #5642
  • Dacpac/SSDT Integration #4321
  • SQL Server Migrations: Batch migrations commands #3928
  • RevEng: Use EF to load metadata for SqlServer provider #1667
  • Use service to create connections #774
  • Feature Request: EF tools and SSDT integration #1186
  • Allow tab indentation for generated migrations #17739
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.ReferenceEqualityComparer is not marked as serializable #17369
  • Improve `HasCheckConstraint` #28775
  • Scaffold non-nullable columns as C# 11 required properties #28400
  • Provide a means to opt-in to deferred transactions by default for Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #28172
  • Unity's IL2CPP // AOT compilation mode compatibility #13099
  • Outline guiding principles and decide on direction for queries in 3.0 #12795
    Epics
  • Support for "dynamic" entity models #2282
    Epics
  • Sequence contains no elements running in-memory query with class key #26238
  • InMemory: Owned navigation for required dependent can generate join #26214
  • Consider adding `AddInMemoryDatabase` sugar #25487
  • Rewrite query in a form that can be translated, or switch to client evaluation explicitly? #25251
  • Query/InMemory: compilation error (failed assert) for query projecting collection navigation followed by distinct #24325
  • Throw DbUpdateException or DbUpdateConcurrencyException for in-memory database errors #23569
  • InMemory: Enable joins between sources which have client eval #21200
  • InMemory: Defining query with shadow props #20023
  • InMemory: Expansion weak entities in OrderBy/ThenBy should happen together #18912
  • InMemory: A better implementation of DefaultIfEmpty #17536
  • InMemory DbContext does not respect CancellationToken on SaveChangesAsync #13368
  • Update in-memory database to use optimistic offline lock for IsRowVersion concurrency #10625
  • InMemory: Cascade Delete Support #3924
  • Make InMemory provider enforce uniqueness of Alternate Keys #3850
  • Add FK constraint checking to the in-memory provider #2166
  • Improve the in-memory database provider #22962
    Epics
  • Test: InMemory and Value Comparers #19465
  • Look into the performance of AsNoTrackingWithIdentity #28579
  • Deprecate PMC tooling in favor of .NET CLI tooling #28414

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29438
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 2.1.38 #29437
  • [release/6.0] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29435
  • [release/3.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29434
  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433

Merged

  • Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29425
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29439
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
